summary: Adds some wild and stray horses that you can actually keep.
descriptionHtml:
*fixed issue with horses added to "stolen horses" count

This is for all my fellow horse hoarders... ehrm, herders, out there!

The horses of Skyrim are very cute, but not particularly useful. And every now and then you meet a horse in the wilderness, and you can ride it but not keep it :(

When I started using Convenient Horses and Automatic Variants, horses became so much more fun. Actually useful! And with lots of different colors! But I still wish I could keep the stray ones. So I made this very simple little mod that adds some stray and wild horses to Skyrim - horses that you can actually keep, because technically they are already yours.

There aren't 1000000000000s of them. Only a few. They are called "Stray Horse", "Bandit Horse", "Forsworn Horse" and "Wild Horse". "Bandit Horse" and "Forsworn Horse" can be found near bandit camps and Forsworn camps respectively. Wild Horse sometimes can be found in small groups, and sometimes alone. Stray Horse is often found near roads.

Convenient Horses and Automatic Variants are recommended but not necessary for this mod.
author: broder fisk
